1.0.0.name: wordpress/yith-footer-banner
1.0.0.description:
Did you ever see all the nice, customized, and high converting footer banners over there? Like the one we are using here Now you'll be able to have your loved one. What are you waiting for? Start customizing!

Working demo is available here: LIVE DEMO 1 LIVE DEMO 2

Installation

Once you have installed the plugin, you just need to activate the plugin in order to enable it.

Configuration

YITH Footer Banner will add a new page under Appearance -> Footer Banner, where you can configure the plugin and customize the frontend page.

Developer

Are you a developer? Want to customize the templates or the style of the plugin? Read on the documentation and discover how to do that.

Support
